loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check or the book is a prison. If you fail, roll a die. On a failure, a monster appears from the book. On a success, you are drawn into the book for a time. Stay here next turn.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.name: Yuggoth
loc1.description: A monster appears from the darkness!

other.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to find something to defend yourself with. Take the first Weapon from the Common Item Deck.
